sent.orig: While we all admit the good effects, we also admit its bad effects.
sent.trans: 我们虽然承认它所带来的好处，我们也承认它带来的坏处。

sent.orig: Oberlin College was the first college to admit women and the first to admit blacks.
sent.trans: 奥伯林学院是第一个大学生承认妇女和第一个承认黑人。

sent.orig: If you are willing to admit faults, you have one less fault to admit.
sent.trans: 自愿认错的人罪恶已经减轻了。

sent.orig: If you cheated on your spouse, would you admit it to a researcher?
sent.trans: 如果你背着另一半搞外遇，你会向调查员承认吗？

sent.orig: But researchers admit that creating the sensations of touch and smell will be the biggest challenge.
sent.trans: 然而研究人员承认创造触感和气味将是最大的挑战。
